command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/e/9/c/dataset_e9caf137-ccd4-4d45-9e27-9fb208c25ad1.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&            bcftools view     --samples 'NA00002'     --min-ac 1 --max-ac 1 --types "snps"            --regions-overlap 1          --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/6/d/dataset_c6d3aed0-d6a1-4521-92f6-4561d77d0d73.dat'

params.sec_filter: {"exclude_types": null, "known_or_novel": null, "max_ac": "1", "max_af": "", "max_alleles": "", "min_ac": "1", "min_af": "", "min_alleles": "", "phased": null, "private": null, "select_genotype": null, "types": "snps", "uncalled": null}
